definition: devoid of any qualifications or disguise or adornment, to make less lively, intense, or vigorous
details:
adjective
- devoid of any qualifications or disguise or adornment
= example: devoid of any qualifications or disguise or adornment
= synonyms: crude
- characterized by directness in manner or speech
= synonyms: forthright
- used of a knife or other blade
- having a broad or rounded end
= example: having a broad or rounded end
verb
- to make less lively, intense, or vigorous
= example: to make less lively, intense, or vigorous
= synonyms: deaden
- to make less intense
= example: to make less intense
- to make dull or less sharp
= example: to make dull or less sharp
= synonyms: dull
